Description:
The FHIR DocumentReference resource describes information about a document. The DocumentReference resource includes information about a document, the associated patient and author, and information about its creation. The DocumentReference resource only contains metadata about the document. The actual document content is accessed via the Binary resource that is referenced in DocumentReference.content.attachment.url.

The DocumentReference resource returns available data for all of the data categories of the Common Clinical Data Set (CCDS).

The read interaction enables the lookup of a DocumentReference resource by a constant server ID. The read interaction allows clients to store only the server ID, and with a single request, retrieve the most up-to-date information about a procedure. Read interactions typically begin with a client having previously established a relationship, often through querying for DocumentReferences through the search interaction.
SampleResponse:
<DocumentReference xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">

<created value="2016-02-09T00:00:00" />

<indexed value="2016-02-09T00:00:00" />

<status value="current" />

<id value="Ta5OjgPrhRxHl8Q5l.wi1gAB" />

<subject>

<display value="John A Doe" />

<reference value="https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/DSTU2/Patient/TVvHM06czXsYBOZYtJiz9BsSuvzmIbZGbIRzim-CwknYB" />

</subject>

<class>

<text value="Summarization of Episode Note" />

<coding>

<system value="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" />

<code value="34133-9" />

<display value="Summarization of Episode Note" />

</coding>

</class>

<type>

<text value="Summarization of Episode Note" />

<coding>

<system value="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" />

<code value="34133-9" />

<display value="Summarization of Episode Note" />

</coding>

</type>

<content>

<attachment>

<contentType value="application/xml" />

<url value="https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/DSTU2/Binary/Ta5OjgPrhRxHl8Q5l.wi1gAB" />

</attachment>

</content>

<masterIdentifier>

<value value="1.2.840.114350.1.13.5552.1.7.8.688883.12952" />

</masterIdentifier>

</DocumentReference>

DocumentReference.Name: DocumentReference
DocumentReference.Description: An instance of the DSTU2 DocumentReference resource.

url.Name: url
url.Description: A reference to the Binary resource which contains the document content.

identifier.Name: identifier
identifier.Description: The associated encounter's Epic CSN identifier.

created.Name: created
created.Description:
Document creation time.

This element is not populated in February 2019 and later versions of Epic. In February 2019 and later, use the Indexed element instead.

indexed.Name: indexed
indexed.Description: When this document reference was created.

masterIdentifier.Name: masterIdentifier
masterIdentifier.Description: The associated encounter's Epic CSN identifier.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: Who/what is the subject of the document.
